content.eamr: ( ing-0 "2/3 cup butter, softened" )
( ing-1 "1/4 cup white sugar" )
( ing-2 "1 1/4 cups all-purpose flour" )
( ing-3 "1/2 cup butter" )
( ing-4 "1/2 cup packed light brown sugar" )
( ing-5 "2 tablespoons light corn syrup" )
( ing-6 "1/2 cup sweetened condensed milk" )
( ing-7 "1 1/4 cups milk chocolate chips" )

content.text: 0) Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (176 degrees C)
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Preheat"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( tool-0-0 "oven"@11:15 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "350 degrees F"@19:33 / TEMPERATURE )
		:heat ( temp-0-1 "176 degrees C"@-1:-1 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) In a medium bowl, mix together 2/3 cup butter, 1/4 cup white sugar, and 1 1/4 cup flour until evenly crumbly.
content.eamr:
( inst-1 / R
	:inform ( ac-1-0 "mix"@21:24 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "2/3 cup butter"@34:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "1/4 cup white sugar"@50:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-2 "1 1/4 cup flour"@75:90 / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-1-0 "until evenly crumbly"@91:111 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:loc ( tool-1-0 "a medium bowl"@6:19 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 2) Press into 9 inch square baking pan.
4) In a 2 quart saucepan, combine 1/2 cup butter, brown sugar, corn syrup, and sweetened condensed milk.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "combine"@26:33 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "1/2 cup butter"@34:48 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "brown sugar"@50:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "corn syrup"@63:73 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "sweetened condensed milk"@79:103 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-4-0 "a 2 quart saucepan"@6:24 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Remove from heat and beat vigorously with a wooden spoon for about 3 minutes.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:source ( "heat"@15:19 / OTHER )
	)
	:inform ( ac-7-1 "beat"@24:28 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:instrument ( tool-7-0 "a wooden spoon"@45:59 / TOOL )
		:duration ( dur-7-0 "3 minutes"@70:79 / DUR )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Pour over baked crust (warm or cool).
9) Cool until it begins to firm.
10) Melt chocolate and pour over caramel layer.
13) Cut into squares (about 48 - small because it is rich).
